_sText: deathrun_iceworld_v2 by 'cS.Metz * UPDATE: March 6th 2011 * Fixed Terrorist team bugs due to engine update. Sorry it took so long to fix, I haven't really been mapping recently. Please replace v2 with v2fix to fully enjoy my map once more. :) Information: A snowy deathrun map for all you runners out there. This is the second version of my first deathrun map, I hope I have brought you a fun and enjoyable map. I've tried to keep the icy theme throughout the map with the traps, endings and secrets, and would love to know what you think of it. Also, if you find any bugs, please report them to me on this website and I shall address them when I can. Please download and enjoy my map and let me know what you and your server communities think of it. Credits: Map design and creation by 'cS.Metz with special thanks to Fibbs and my friends for some trap ideas Map Details: - 15 traps (two skill/random) - 3 standard endings - 2 small secrets - 1 secret ending - AFK Timer (one minute) - Map Timer (five minutes) Update Log: v2fix - fixed Terrorist team bugs due to engine update v2 - Changed AWP/Knife endings - Added 3D Skybox - Disabled fall damage - Altered trap decals - Minor bug fixes - Damage per second traps now do more damage v1beta - Release version
